feature_tree: :r Weather Station (weather_station) :m Measurements (measurements) :g [1,*] : Pressure (pressure) : Temperature (temperature) : Wind Speed (wind_speed) :m Data Source (data_source) :g [1,1] : Internet (internet) : Demo (demo) : External Services (external_services) :m Output Format (output_format) :g [1,1] : Text (text) : Web Server (web_server) : File (file) :m Format (format) :g [1,1] : XML (xml) : HTML (html) : Plain Text (plain_text) :m Language (language) :g [1,1] : English (english) : German (german) :o Alarm (alarm) :g [1,*] : Freeze Point (freeze_point) : Storm Alert (storm_alert)
